tool_description: Estimates speech duration, calculates pacing requirements, and provides timing breakdowns for different sections.

content_blocks.description: Speech sections with approximate word counts or content descriptions

speaking_pace.description: Natural speaking speed: slow, moderate, fast

target_duration.description: Desired total speech length in minutes

pause_frequency.description: Expected pause density: minimal, moderate, frequent

interaction_time.description: Minutes allocated for audience interaction or Q&A

error_messages: Empty content blocks: Provide at least one content section for timing calculation
Invalid speaking pace: Must be one of [slow, moderate, fast]
Invalid target duration: Duration must be between 1 and 300 minutes
Invalid pause frequency: Must be one of [minimal, moderate, frequent]
Content-duration mismatch: Content volume doesn't fit target duration at specified pace
usage: Enter content blocks array, speaking pace, and target duration. Optionally specify pause frequency and interaction time for comprehensive timing analysis.

section_timings.description: Time allocation for each content block

timing_flexibility.description: Areas where timing can be adjusted if needed
